title: About me
text:
Hey, I'm Frank! In September 2023, I landed my first job in front-end development at Leads.io. I started out with CRO development, which was the perfect start for sharpening my CSS and JavaScript skills. Before long, I was building Vue components and creating full CRO templates. Doing all this gave me a good opportunity to learn the fundamentals.

After a year and a half, I took the chance and went freelance. These days I spend my time building websites from the ground up with Nuxt. E-commerce, storytelling sites, business pages, funnels, and CMS integrations. Going solo has been a game-changer for my growth, and the side projects I've taken on have taught me more than I could've imagined.

Here's what I bring to the table:

  • Turning Figma designs into pixel-perfect code
  • Building complete websites with CMS integration
  • Building e-commerce solutions
  • SPA/SSR/SSG
  • Developing with accessibility in mind
  • State management
  • API handling
  • Performance optimization
  • SEO optimization
